required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Targeting CD19 and CD22 CAR-T Cells Immunotherapy in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory B Cell Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of CD19-CD22 CAR-T Cells Immunotherapy in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory B Cell Lymphoma

collaborator.agency: Shanghai Ultra-T Immune Therapeutics Co. LTD

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation the safety,tolerability, preliminary efficacy,and PK/PD of CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells for the treatment of B cell lymphoma.

detailed_description.textblock: A non randomized study ,plans to enrollment 24 subjects of B cell lymphoma .The subjects will divide into low, medium and high dose groups，to evaluate the safety and tolerability of CD19-CD22 CAR - T cells，to evaluate the preliminary efficacy and observe PK/PD parameters of CD19-CD22 CAR -T cells immunotherapy in patients with relapsed or refractory B cell lymphoma .

primary_outcome.time_frame: Form infusion CAR-T cells to 28 days after infusion
primary_outcome.description: Observe wether dose limiting toxicity will happened in dose escalation phase

primary_outcome.time_frame: Form infusion CAR-T cells to 2 years after infusion
primary_outcome.description: The overall response rate after CD19-CD22 CAR-T Cells immunotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of various types of adverse recation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Form infusion CAR-T cells to 2 years after infusion
secondary_outcome.description: According to CTCAE 5.0, record the level , type of adverse events, evaluat the correlation of CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Form infusion CAR-T cells to 2 years after infusion
Form infusion CAR-T cells to 2 years after infusion

arm_group.description: CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells injection, infused only once,3-6 subjects of low dose group will be intravenously infuse with 0.5×10^6 CAR+T cells/kg.
CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells injection, infused only once,3-6 subjects of middle dose group will be intravenously infuse with 2.0×10^6 CAR+Tcells/kg.
CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells injection, infused only once,3-6 subjects of high dose group will be intravenously infuse with 5.0×10^6 CAR+Tcells/kg.
CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells injection, infused only once.After determined maximum tolerated dose,15 subjects of amplification dose group will be intravenously infuse with 0.5-5.0×10^6 CAR+Tcells/kg.

intervention.description: A autologous doping CAR - T cells injection targets with CD19 and CD22，fluorine dara marina injection(30 mg/m2，QD×3d) and cyclophosphamide injection (300 mg/m2，QD×3d)will be used to remove the lymphocyte before infusion CD19-CD22 CAR-T cells .
